instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Select the General tab. Tap Battery . Tap Battery saver . Tap the Battery saver switch to turn it on or off.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . Select the General tab. Tap Battery . Tap Battery saver . Tap the Battery saver switch to turn it on. The switch turns blue and moves right to the ON position. Tap Turn Battery saver on and select from: Immediately 10% battery 20% battery 30% battery 50% battery Select or clear these check boxes: Auto-sync Wi-Fi Bluetooth Vibrate on touch Brightness Screen timeout Front touch key light Home LED button To access option details, tap the Settings icon next to: Brightness 10% brightness 20% brightness 30% brightness 50% brightness Screen timeout 15 sec 30 sec 1 min
